page.title: 02Health, Hospital,Gorleston.
page.content: James Paget Hospital, Gt Yarmouth. Buildings and Staff. The hospital was built in two phases. Phase one was built between 1978 and 1981. Phase one was built between January 1982 and June 1985. The total cost was Â£20 million. There are 270 rooms in the Nurses Home and the hospital has 537 beds. Thre are 22 ambulances for the area covered by the hospital. There are 18 wards. Each one has about 30-40 patients. There is one isolation ward which contains 20 individual rooms. Visiting hours vary. Some are from 1400_1800, or 1400_1600 but there is always a visiting hour from 1900_2000. In Maternity the hours are 1530_1630, Childrens wards & Intensive Care have visiting at all times.
